case.state: Ahh yes, a game of Strip Duel Monsters with my Duel Academy frie... I mean idiot classmates that could never hope to beat me.
You will be playing against a card game expert, one of the best Duel Monsters players in the world.
You want to duel with the Chazz, huh? Ready to take a beating?
And you're jumping right in to the deep end. If you can handle me, you can handle anyone.
This place has a maid too? Hey waitress, an order of fried shrimp and a root beer, please?
Chariot Card Game? This wasn't what I was promised!
Some idiotic idol, huh? Shouldn't be too hard to take down.
Did you just say orgy? Because I think I just heard about an orgy?
You needed a magic artifact to come here? All I needed to do was drive here. Sure my car cost a million dollars, but I don't see why you'd need magic to beat it.
What have you you've got against angels? They're pretty harmless all things considered. Nothing compared to my Dragons, Machines, and beasts.
Jessie? You're not gonna be talking in southern slang about how Crystal Beasts are the best, are you?
A fashion model? I can work with that. You'll electrify us all, just like Jaden's Elemental Hero Sparkman. Ain't that right, Ms. Sparkplug?
I'm playing with a ball? You must be one of those stupid Herald monsters. You do realize that you're blue-balling me, Blue Ball.
A werewolf?! What kinda furry crap did I just stumble into?
N? The hell kinda name is that? Is it an alias? Is there a prize if I guess it right? I love coming up with dumb nicknames, so I'll do it anyway, Noxious.
Purple skin? Don't tell me I got trapped in the Spirit world... again.
Wrestling? What a barbaric sport. Duel Monsters is where it's at, Mikazukinoyaiba.
I'm fighting a Fairy type monster? My machines and dragons will make short work of you, Pit.
You a shrine maiden, Miko? The best Duel Monsters shrine maiden is Ghost Ogre. She's so good that everyone hates her. But I don't hate you, Ghost Ogre. Not yet, at least.
Ping? What are you, some reject cousin of the Six Samurai? You may be good, but my Beetron is better.
Okay, who brought the talking farm animal? The Chazz is many things, but a furry is not one of them.
Glasses? You some kind of nerd, Futaba? The Chazz is always down to toy with some nerds.
A nerd in a dress... This is gonna be fun, Chihiro.
Poor, poor Ryuji. If only you knew what you're in for. That being a cruising and bruising from The Chazz.
A pop idol? (Has someone popped her cherry yet? Because The Chazz would most definitely love to.)
Who's this girl after my heart? Blonde hair and big tits are my favorites.
Short shorts and guns? I haven't seen many people like you hanging around Duel Academy... and that's probably a good thing.
Oh hey, it's a lawyer. My family wouldn't be where they are without your kind, Franziska.
Trying to compete with me in the delinquent department, aren't you, Ryuko? I'm a master delinquent. You can't compete with me.
Stupid inventory can't keep itself free of bugs... Where's a can of insecticide when you need it?
So, how'd you get those burn scars? Probably from the fryer oil at your Burgerpalooza job, if I had to guess.
Hey, who let the burn victim in here? I thought only sexy girls were allowed, and burns aren't sexy.
What's the matter, cat got your tongue? Literally?
I know why you're speechless, you're so in awe of my presence that you can't put it into words.
They call you a surgeon? I guess medical school is even crazier than Duel Academy.
What's with the giant arm? I'm guessing that's not a Duel Disk, now is it?
You look like a worthy opponent. A person to prove myself against. A shame I can't prove myself against you at Duel Monsters though.
Why hello there Haru! I believe we've met before.
Well you better learn quickly, you Blue Raspberry Magician Girl.
Oooh. A belly dancer. She'll be fun to play with.
They never told me there was a cash prize. I might already be a billionaire, but what's wrong with having a few thousand extra dollars in my coffers?
Supreme Leader!? My family might be evil, but they don't support people like that.
Is this some kind of a joke? Tell me the wrong location for the strip poker game on purpose?
Well then, you've come to the right place. It's time to practice acting with an arrogant, obnoxious, entitled brat. That would be me!
Yeah, tribute the Machine type monster. Tribute it for something with big tits.
Okay, who's the person that finds classical literature sexy?
I don't think of a bunch of hundred year old books as sexy, but whatever.
I hope these cards are waterproof. Would be a shame if they got wet.
All this steam makes me Duel Monster cards unhappy. I'll be sure to sue this place if they get damaged.
Back at Duel Academy? I thought I'd never have to go back here again.
I mean, I want to sleep with Alexis, but I wouldn't want to do it in a classroom...
You think the beach impresses me? My family owns a beach. Several in fact.
(Sex with Alexis on a nude beach... so romantic.)
I don't drink, but hopefully the rest of you get wasted. You can't play poker very well when you're intoxicated.
I'll be sure to buy Alexis a drink or eight. Hopefully this bar has what she likes.
Hey, what the? I WAS PROMISED STRIP DUEL MONSTERS! YOU HEAR ME?
Where is everybody? Who are these losers? Where is my beloved Alexis?
I use Pot of Greed. It lets me draw two cards.
It's the most overused Duel Monsters spell card there is, Pot of Greed. I draw two cards.
Blah Blah Blah I activate Pot of Greed Blah Blah Blah.
I activate Pot of Greed, the one and only. Nothing like its two dozen worse counterparts.
HELP ME, I'M BEING HELD AGAINST MY WILL! I'VE BEEN TAKEN BY THE RULE 34 ARMY
Slifer was originally known as Osiris the Sky Dragon. I'm curious as to why it was changed too. But there's a producer on my show named Slifer. Hmm...
Did you know that there's almost 10,000 Duel Monsters cards? And I say this knowing it will be outdated in 6 months when we pass that mark...
Did you know that Yami Yugi was originally a violent psychopath? He straight up murdered people!
If you dislike me, or think my fourth wall breaking is obnoxious, then be sure to scream incoherently into the feedback box that appears after I whoop you!
If you hate 4Kids, then take solace in the fact that they were sued and utterly destroyed. By me. Officially, it was over ZEXAL, but it was actually me!
Finger guns are considered a high-class weapon in my world. Why else would Pegasus trust his goons with them?
The Chazz demands ~cards~ cards.
I'll draw ~cards~ cards.
This hand is too puny, I'll draw ~cards~ cards.
I'll beat you once I draw ~cards~ cards.
(This is a good place to hide some weird facts, because it scrolls by so fast that nobody can read it.)
(I can hide strange facts in here, because the text scrolls by so fast that nobody can read it.)
(I have all the juicy info on Duel Monsters, and I'll shove it all here, in the card swapping lines, where nobody has the time to read it!)
So embarrassed soembarrassedd sembarrasseded!
I don't care what I'm discarding, I want to lose right now.
Give me bad cards or give me death! Wait no, I'm too young to die!
I'd discard 100 cards if it made me more likely to lose.
Take them all, I don't care!
Those cards will be of no use to you once I flush them down the toilet. Witch this flush I mean. <i>I'm so sorry, that joke was terrible.
Might as well toss your cards in the toilet, cause I'm gonna flush them all away.
Bada-bing, bada-boom. Simple as that.
Don't take this too personally, I'm just better than you.
And this is why they call me The Chazz.
I'm gonna OTK you all with this hand.
A shame I can't take off all your clothing with one blow.
My card effect activates! It means I automatically win the round!
I should be playing the lottery, not playing strip poker with you dorks!
I hope you are ready to get Chazzed.
The only way this hand could be better was if the cards had naked women on them!
The Chazz is coming in like a Rank 10 Train, smashing through all barriers... You know where I'm heading.
This is like taking candy from a baby. Not that I'd ever do that. I can just buy all the candy I want with my ostentacious wealth.
The one time I want to lose and I get a hand like this?
I CURSE OJAMA YELLOW!
So this is where all my luck has been?
Thanks Ojama Yellow, totally fantastic, totally don't wanna chuck you in an incinerator right now.
Some people think that your choice of cards says things about your personality, I think it’s just fun blowing things up with my XYZ Dragon Cannon.
Whatever.
I am unstoppable!
Against slackers like you, I could win with anything!
There are zero hands that can defeat me!
Mediocrity shouldn't be what I strive for, but for now it will have to do.
Fine, if I can make a deck out of weak monsters and win, I can also win with this mediocre hand.
The Chazz can make any hand work, including this one.
Meh.
You think you can bring the Chazz down with these mediocre cards? Think again!
These cards are way lamer than my Armed Dragon LV7! They can't even generate holograms.
Please be the worst hand, please be the worst hand...
Could I get a Shapesnatch or two in this hand?
I usually don't have to fight this hard to get a bad hand.
Every turn I have this underwear on is a turn I plot your demise, ~player~.
I don't just gotta do this without Alexis, I gotta do it with a bunch of guys as well?!
Hey, where's all the girls? I gotta play Strip Poker, and I don't even get to look at any boobies?
I've already seen Bastion's penis, I don't need to see any more.
Hey, what's the big idea?
Jaden would never get a hand this bad. That's what you get when you have main character powers.
Of course, of course I get the trash hands.
I guess the plot of this episode is "Chazz gets completely humiliated. Again."
Hey writers, Can I not be the butt of a joke, just this once?
How am I supposed to Chazz people up with cards like these?
Of course...
I may have made a terrible mistake.
Aaaand there goes my chance this turn...
Can we skip the battle phase this turn?
I... uh... activate... uh... swords of non revealing light, which means that I won't have to strip even if I lose this round... Right?
I'd love to use a Magical Mallet on this hand... and smash the dealer with a regular mallet.
This hand is bad, but your hands are probably worse. I'd bet on that.
Good, now let's get these off already...
I'm only losing because I want to. Don't think you've beat the Chazz just yet.
Idiotic dealer, you've given me exactly what I want.
Even when The Chazz loses, he's still a winner!
So, what kind of decks do you all run? I ask so that I can strategize accordingly and beat you easier.
Good thing Jaden isn't here. He'd blab on about how he's gonna be the King of Games, even though he graduated hanging on by a thread.
My love is sadly not present. Alexis Rhodes would make this game even better... assuming that I can find a way to mention this to her without her hitting me with a purse.
I got my diploma from Duel Academy. It's a school on an active volcano, and it's the home of the evil Sacred Beasts. Oh, and they have classes there sometimes I guess.
Slifer Red is the lowest rank at Duel Academy. They're all awful at Duel Monsters. Completely and utterly terrible. Hence why I make fun of them so much.
Maybe you people were with me all along, but you were condemned to obscurity just like Bastion was. He took getting replaced by Hassleberry really hard.
The last adventure I had was fighting Nightshroud, a shadow creature who erases people from existance. I lost, of course.
There's this thing called the Heart of the Cards, but I don't really know how it works, because I'm not the main protagonist.
Seduction isn't my expertise. Atticus Rhodes is a master at it though. Don't be surprised if you zone out and find him fucking you senseless.
I am both rich and very famous. But Slade and Jagger always make sure to host their masked orgies when I'm out of town. I'd make their orgies a thousand times better, though.
Wait, what? You can actually destroy planets? How?
How the crap can one woman destroy a planet all on her own?
If they think you're bad, wait until they get a taste of my Ojama Delta Hurricane. The last thing they'll see is a bunch of mutants flexing their butts.
A witch, huh? Let me guess, it's all smoke machines and holograms.
Magic isn't real, Lotte! Except for Duel Monster spirits. And the Sacred Beasts. And the Light of Destruction. Those are the only exceptions.
Explosion magic? I didn't even know such a school of magic existed... Probably a fake, just like that guy who claims dynamite is a martial art!
All right, Megumin, where's the dynamite?
Aww, look at Mikazukinoyaba apologize for almost murdering you, Cammy. So cute.
You had better not leave to wash your hands. How do we know you won't bail out?
Okay, okay, calm down. Just get in line like the rest of the people mutated by Jagger's toxic waste dump, and you'll get your lawsuit money.
How do you use a duel disk with those arms? It would just get stuck in the middle of the coils.
My dream is to conquer the dueling world with an iron fist. I shall make all the Slifer Slackers bow before me and my awesome dueling prowess.
Flattering is a bit of an understatement. I bet you padded them, didn't you?
I just finished the completed works of Dostoyevsky... In about 30 seconds. Didn't get any of it, but The Chazz's time is too precious to be spend on old literature anyway.
I already have my future wife all picked out, her name is Alexis Rhodes. All I need to do is figure out how to get her to reciprocate my love.
I'm not interested. Professor Banner once drank a bunch of hot sauce, though. No, I don't know how he didn't get sent to the hospital.
That's a little better I guess. At least you know not to pass off shoes as a layer.
So that's not your only form? Just what are you, and what kind of magic do you use?
So you've got a dragon named Mushu, how quaint. Do you hate him just as much as I hate Ojama Yellow?
Whaddaya mean you think it's cute? You think that revolting mutant slug is cute?
You're not supposed to think it's cute, you're supposed to think it's ugly, just like I do.
So your name really is Panty? I don't gotta make fun of you, you make fun of yourself with a name like that!
That last line was a legit question. Someone here smells like death, and I'm looking at you, Number One.
That last part wasn't a lyric. This place stinks worse than than Syrus' bedsheets, and he wet the bed every other night! Do you wet the bed, Number One?
Apologies if I don't trust you, Shantae. But I've learned that most magical entities are pure evil, and I'm just being cautious.
I'm allowed to bring my Z-Metal Tank, right? I won't compete unless I have an absurd advantage.
So you're a Lemon magician girl now? Why are all the new Magician cards themed after fruit, anyway?
What on earth are you talking about? There's no gift The Chazz won't accept. Not even ones given to me in spite.
My own recorded Pro League duels are pretty nice. Aside from that, opera is boring, Shakespeare is an old fart, and the guy who made Cats should be forced to clean Pharaoh's litter box.
Marik Ishtar managed to almost conquer the world at the age of 16. You should at least be able to drink before you dream of conquering the world.
I almost got Aster Phoenix kicked out of the Pro League once. It's all good now. Aster can keep his stupid Destiny End Dragoon anyway.
I had a kitten as a kid. Slade had it euthanized when it peed all over his hard drive.
The only pet I need is the hideous slug demon that haunts my dreams.
Most of the Pro League duelists wield personalized Duel Disks. I probably should modify mine one of these days, thanks for the reminder, Yuelia.
Axel Brodie, 1000%. He's some kind of secret agent, but he always needs Jaden to help rescue him. At least his gun is kinda cool.
Tyranno Hassleberry. He claims it's "Dino DNA", but I think that's just a codeword for "Mentally Unstable".
As an actual answer, one that's willing to help their students with anything. Like smuggling me high-powered cards to use against Jaden.
I can't tell you what makes a good teacher, but I can tell you what makes a bad one. If they have a deep voice and an obsession with snakes, you fire them as soon as possible.

I can't tell you what makes a good teacher, but I can tell you what makes a bad one. Make sure they aren't actually a homunculus in disguise. The last time Duel Academy hired a guy like that, he stole my soul.
The only fishing I'll accept is the fishing in Jagger's high powered net boats. A thousand times more efficient that way, who cares whether or not it's sustainable?
How about Lyman Banner? A cool, groovy alchemy teacher, who turned out to be an evil mummy bent on absorbing my soul. Has anyone ever tried to steal your soul, Yuelia?

Chumley Huffington is the one you're looking for. He doesn't have the skill to be an actual Duel Monsters player. But as a card designer, he's all right. He should really make some Armed Dragon support though.
Jaden, a million and 10%. My arch nemesis never knows when to quit. It's really annoying.
Jaden fell into a deep depression after saving the world for a third time. Who would have guessed that the solution was time travel?
My two brothers are abhorrent, and bent on conquering the world. But when they do, I get a third of it, so I still love them.
Hmmm. There was that Duel Giant or whetever that Jaden fought once. Two losers, uniting as one to cover their mutual weaknesses. There's something poetic there, but I think poetry is lame.
That would be my heart. It may be black and corrupted, but it still has a good idea once or twice.
I have no big preferences on sweets. But Carrot Cake is the worst sweet ever invented. Even worse than Necco Wafers.
I eat expensive meat fairly regularly. But Slade once bagged us an endangered animal to eat. A shame that it went extinct, it was delicious.
Made normally is best. How can any custom tailor top the literal perfection that is the Obelisk Blue uniform?
That would be me. I always get flustered when I'm around my beloved Alexis. She doesn't want to be my girlfriend, though.
Syrus Truesdale just couldn't catch a break. I always loved seeing him hide in garbage cans to get away from everything scary.
Syrus used to match that to a tee. Always living in the shadow of his older brother. But now the roles are swapped, so Syrus is strong and his brother is weak. I never thought Syrus had it in him.
Don't you remember, Haru? Pretty sure your dad met my brothers to discuss buisness a while ago.
Sure, let's go with that. I could come up with a better joke at your expense if you give me some time, though.
Well, Shantae, you look just like the exotic dancers my brothers hire for their private parties. Hopefully you'll be just as horny as they are.
I am a champion! Get your duel disk out and we'll throw down right now!
Just like you, I also have an annoying gimmick, and that is belittling and insulting everyone I meet. You're the perfect person to bear the brunt of it.
Wait, did I just insult myself? Or does it not count since Horse Chazz is a different being than me? Too much philosophy, not enough nudity.
That's a pretty lame rainbow. You can't make a rainbow with just baby blue. I owe my life to the Rainbow Dragon, but I don't owe my life to you.
By the way, Futaba, before you ask, liking Duel Monsters does not make me a nerd. It makes me a pro.
If you're here, then you clearly must be a nerd with nothing better to do... then again, so am I.
Wait, did I just see your arms stretch? You're certainly the wackiest Duel Monster spirit there ever was.
Jura, you look just like the love of my life, a girl named Alexis Rhodes. She wouldn't be caught dead showing her cleavage though, so that's a point in your favor.
You ever heard of Bandit Keith, Revy? You look and sound just like him. All you need is an American flag bandana. Does that sound good, Bandit Revy?
You remind me of Bandit Keith, Revy. That same attitude and penchant for carrying fake guns. I wonder what happened to him? Do you know, Bandit Revy?
The Chazz doesn't need flowers. I gave Alexis flowers once, and she handed me back a Venus flytrap.
A talking butterfly? You're not a cute girl! First my friends all cancel, and then they have me battling insects.
Oh, the butterfly wants to play with us. Can't say I've ever dueled an insect before.
I don't really care how you got them. All I know is that I'm happy that I don't have them.
You know, I don't think we ever had a student with a disability at Duel Academy. That's a good thing, because I'd probably have teased them for it.
I've heard of the strong, silent type before. But you don't look very strong, now do you, Silent Wobby?
And here I thought Duel Academy had some freaks. You make them almost look normal.
You even have hair like a worthy opponent. And by that, I mean hair like mine. Two warriors with gnarled black hair clashing in a game of strip poker. It's a bit poetic.
If you insist on calling yourself a magical girl, then I call you Blueberry, after those lame fruit magicians.
Mass genocide is so wasteful. An infinitely better way of tormenting people is debt bondage. Death lasts for just a moment, but debt will last forever.
I know your real name, but I'm choosing to ignore it, Mystical Sand. That's your name now.
You're going to be so much fun to belittle. So much fun that I'm having trouble coming up with a demeaning nickname for you. Let's skip that part for now though. This is just practice, after all.
WHY AM I ANGRIER ABOUT THAT THAN I AM ABOUT MY LIFE BEING IN DANGER?
Another duel spirit? Powered by a trashy normal Tentacle Plant card? Ojamas are the only good normal monster!
You, Sakura. It's far easier to disguise a girl as a man than it is to disguise a revolting zombie as a girl.
The hat is very stupid looking. Close to a dunce cap, which fits Dust very well.
Hell yeah, I wasn't expecting to meet a member of my fan club in here. Nice to meet you, Tomoko. You don't deserve a humiliating nickname.
Of course I'm real. No writer has the talent to write someone as obnoxious and snobbish as me. (Maybe a velociraptor or something, but that's it.)
Did you leave your Duel Disk at home then? A shame, you could have used it as another layer.
If you're the Queen, then I'm the King... and Jaden is the God Emperor of Mankind... oh how I hate that Slifer Slacker.
Naked already? You're so weak that it's almost sad to defeat you. Emphasis on the word. "almost".
Fried shrimp, any day of the week. Just not with carrots. Carrots are gross.
I can cook fairly decently, but why bother? My family has enough money to hire a full time cook. He won Iron Chef, so you know he has to be good.
Hmmm. Summer is probably best... partly because Jagger can charge up the wazoo for electricity. Gotta power those air conditioners somehow.
Probably a black bear. Because then I can find the person that turned me into one and claw their face off.
Internal monologues, definitely. It helps save on the budget for mouth animations.
Well, my brothers really love tax refund day. They salivate at the thought of all the free money they're getting due to tax breaks for the rich.
I knew it. You and your UFO monster saving the world. Where is that thing anyway, UFO Turtle? That's your obligatory dumb nickname, courtesy of The Chazz.
A dimension where everyone is a horse? Lame. Humans are where it's at.
What does Taoist Sorcery give me access to? Laser Beams? Mind control? X-Ray Vision? That last one would really come in handy...
The more I look at you, Jura, the happier I get.
Those might be the tits that will finally get me to stop chasing Alexis. Good work, Jura.
Jaden can keep Alexis, I'm going for you now, Jura. I hope you like my body as much as I like yours.
You sure you've never met a man before? Really sure? You wouldn't prefer some muscle bound freak over The Chazz, now would you?
Speaking of Phantom Thieves, you look like you belong on their wanted poster. I'm not one of those chumps that will get fooled by a simple mask, so I'm guessing it's you.
I wonder what kind of Duel Monster spirit you are? I don't think I've ever seen your card.
I've never seen your card, Yuelia. Don't tell me you're a common rarity card spirit?
Wait, I insult you all game and that's what sets you off?
Did I just say something I shouldn't have? Pull a nerve or something?
So we get live entertainment with our strip poker? Awesome. Will you dance when you're naked as well?
My Obelisk Blue posse usually comes with a live band. If not, no biggie.
A Walkman? What kind of troglodyte still carries one of those around? MP3 players are the way of the future.
Why thank you, Dust. I make sure to use lots of gel on it to keep it nice and rigid. Not a loose strand anywhere.
There's too many to count. I got mind controlled, turned into a zombie, sacrificed, sent to another dimension, and I got covered in paint... twice.
Other card games can't compete with Duel Monsters. I'll show you that by beating you!
Low class slackers and their inferior TCGs. I'll show you the power of Duel Monsters, Akko!
No? Good. I'm sure you've got a ton of jewels, but you'd be pretty upset if they started talking like Arnold Schwarzenegger, now would you?
Twilight Sparkle? With a name like that, you sound more like a dragon instead of a human. Twilight Spark Dragon. Like Stardust Spark Dragon, only purple.
Twilight Sparkle? What are you, some kinda girls toy? The Chazz only played with G.I. Joe and He-Man as a kid, not lame dolls.
Dancing and singing won't save the world. My XYZ Dragon Cannon blowing stuff up will save the world.
You some kinda delinquent with that black coat, Ryuji? Despite what it may look like, I'm a valedictorian.
They may not have dragons on them, but I won't be beaten that easily. Acting all confident against The Chazz doesn't end well for people.
You say that like you aren't already an expert at seducing men. Blonde and big tits, what's not to love?
If this is you being a novice at seduction, I can't imagine what you will be as a seduction expert.
The Chazz will be happy to give you his seed. But he prefers strong people. You gotta prove yourself an expert at card games. Duel Monsters specifically.
Wait, really? I figured you'd get hundreds just from having me here.
Breaking the bank is no obstacle for me. Family fortune and all that.
Hey, being completely obsessed with someone to a really unhealthy degree is my job. But as for someone else, depends on how pretty they are.
I don't think I've ever gotten sick. When you're being hounded by ghosts and demons, the common cold starts to seem pretty weak.
I'm just going to assume it involved handcuffs and a satellite laser cannon. That sounds like a good way to find out someone's penis size. And to destroy the world too.
Did it involve him going insane from abandonment? That's how I found out about how Bastion's was.
Probably my first proper duel with Jaden. I had some of the best cards in the game, and Jaden won with a card he got from being such a nice guy. He made me a laughingstock.
Syrus ain't exactly a friend, but my response to him whenever he doubts his deck is to throw him in a trash can. Duel Academy has no place for self-doubt.
There will be time to play around later, ~player~. Like when I beat you.
Duel Academy has got some pretty interesting sights. You ever seen an active volcano?
Do you like the color purple? We've a whole separate dimension that is nothing but purple.
I can work with that. Surely Jagger won't notice a few hundred dollars go missing.
You'll sleep with me if I give you stuff? That's a deal I'd happily accept.
You want me to become your pay pig? I don't know what that is, but it sounds like fun.
Guess it's Yiff-fest 2005 for The Chazz.
When that dumb moon turns me into a drooling wolf, I'll bite the rest of you. You will suffer exactly as much as The Chazz does.
I can feel myself transforming any moment now.
You gave away one of your cards? Hopefully it wasn't a promotional card. You know you'll have a hell of a time finding that again, unless you look on eBay.
Don't worry, Cynthia, I generally don't keep track of people's kids. I'm having enough trouble as is babysitting the Ojamas.
Ojama Yellow has those gross stalk eyes. I wonder if those help him see better?
So you're the idiot who's been climbing my brothers' buildings! Those smudge marks never come out.
That's not the point, I want it to not want to be my friend.
I remind you of your home? I don't wanna look like a dumb wizard, I wanna look like a cool and awesome duelist!
I give it a perfect 10. Anyone who disagrees will get Chazzed.
Your personal hygiene is the first thing you're concerned about? Not the shadow realm magic?
Well, ~player~, you made it to the final round. Good for a slacker, but not good enough to beat The Chazz.
One last hand, for old times sake. Maybe the nameless background character will actually win a duel for once.
My friends may have all canceled, but that's a good thing. Instead of fighting champions, I'm dueling a bunch of novices.
No matter. If I can't see Alexis in the nude, then I'll just strip you with the force of a Duel Monsters Champion!
I didn't even know they made card games other than Duel Monsters... No matter! I'll still win anyways.
Wondering why my Duel Disk is blue? I got this in the hidden 4th season that never aired in America.
I got this swanky blue disk in the unaired 4th season, available now on Crunchyroll.
You thought my Duel Disk was supposed to be silver, right? Clearly you've never watched the fourth season that you couldn't watch because it never aired in America.
Why do I have a sudden craving for red meat?
I get the feeling that this werewolf thing isn't something I'm gonna be able to duel my way out of.
What will happen when Alexis finds out about this? She's not a furry, is she?
Thank goodness for artificial light. That's one big weakness of your curse, all I gotta do to avoid it is stay indoors.
Do I need to bribe you to lose? Cause I've got the money for that!
What's a guy gotta do to lose their underwear around here?
When I try to win, I fail miserably. When I try to lose, I win without fail. The story of my life, ladies and gentlemen.
This game is rigged, I just know it!
